docs.title: Definitions
docs.text:
Severity (impact on player): - S0 Crash/data loss, progression block, save corruption. - S1 Major feature broken, frequent soft lock, widespread missing content. - S2 Noticeable defect, inconsistent behavior, minor progression friction. - S3 Cosmetic or trivial issue.

Priority (when to fix): - P0 Must fix before release branch cut. - P1 Fix for upcoming milestone. - P2 Backlog; fix if time. - P3 Track; unlikely to fix.

docs.title: Triage rules
docs.text:
• S0/P0 routed immediately to engineering lead. QA verifies hotfix.
  • Narrative issues reference scene_id when applicable.
  • Attach logs, repro rate, and hardware profile for S0–S1.
  • Label format: area/feature, severity/S#, priority/P#.
